# üöÄ zencf - CF Clearance Scraper Module

**Klien API untuk Cloudflare Bypass**  
_Bypass Cloudflare WAF & Turnstile tanpa browser headless._

`zencf` adalah klien ringan untuk mengatasi tantangan Cloudflare seperti **WAF** dan **Turnstile** tanpa perlu menjalankan browser headless.

---

## üíæ Instalasi

### Menggunakan npm
```bash
npm install zencf

Menggunakan yarn

yarn add zencf
```

---

**üìã Penggunaan**

Modul ini mendukung CommonJS (require) dan ES Modules (import).


---

**üß± Contoh Penggunaan ‚Äî CommonJS**

### ‚Ä¢ WAF Session
```javascript
const { zencf } = require('zencf')

async function main() {
  const session = await zencf.wafSession('httos://example.com/')

  console.log('Cookies:', session.cookies)
  console.log('User-Agent:', session.headers['User-Agent'])
}

main().catch(console.error)
```

---

### ‚Ä¢ Turnstile Min

```javascript
const { zencf } = require('zencf')

async function solve() {
  const { token } = await zencf.turnstileMin(
    'https://spotimate.io',
    '0x4AAAAAAA_b5m4iQN755mZw'
  )

  console.log('Turnstile Token:', token)
}

solve().catch(console.error)
```

---

### ‚Ä¢ Turnstile Max

```javascript
const { zencf } = require('zencf')

async function solve() {
  const { token } = await zencf.turnstileMax(
    'https://spotimate.io'
  )

  console.log('Turnstile Token (Max):', token)
}

solve().catch(console.error)
```

---

### ‚Ä¢ Ambil HTML Source

```javascript
const { zencf } = require('zencf')

async function getSource() {
  const res = await zencf.source('httos://example.com/')

  console.log(res.source.slice(0, 300))
}

getSource().catch(console.error)
```

---

### üì¶ Contoh Penggunaan ‚Äî ES Modules (Static Import)

‚Ä¢ **Turnstile Min**

```javascript
import { zencf } from 'zencf'

const { token } = await zencf.turnstileMin(
  'https://spotimate.io',
  '0x4AAAAAAA_b5m4iQN755mZw'
)

console.log('Token Turnstile:', token)
```

---

‚Ä¢ **WAF Session**

```javascript
import { zencf } from 'zencf'

const session = await zencf.wafSession('httos://example.com/')

console.log(session.cookies)
console.log(session.headers['User-Agent'])
```

---

‚Ä¢ **Ambil Source (ESM)**

```javascript
import { zencf } from 'zencf'

const page = await zencf.source('https://spa-website.com/')

console.log(page.source.substring(0, 200) + '...')
```

---

‚öôÔ∏è **ES Modules ‚Äî Dynamic Import**
```javascript
async function run() {
  const { zencf } = await import('zencf')

  const { token } = await zencf.turnstileMin(
    'https://spotimate.io',
    '0x4AAAAAAA_b5m4iQN755mZw'
  )

  console.log(token)
}

run().catch(console.error)
```

---

üß≠ **API Reference**

Semua fungsi bersifat async dan akan melempar Error jika gagal.


---

1Ô∏è‚É£ `zencf.wafSession(url, proxy?)`

Mengambil cookies dan headers untuk melewati Cloudflare WAF.

Parameter:

url (string, wajib) ‚Äî URL target

proxy (string, opsional) ‚Äî host:port atau user:pass@host:port

```javascript
const session = await zencf.wafSession('https://example.com')
```

---

2Ô∏è‚É£ `zencf.turnstileMin(url, siteKey, proxy?)`

Menyelesaikan Cloudflare Turnstile dengan mode cepat.
```javascript
const { token } = await zencf.turnstileMin(
  'https://example.com/login',
  'SITE_KEY'
)
```

---

3Ô∏è‚É£ `zencf.turnstileMax(url, proxy?)`

Mode maksimum dengan simulasi interaksi pengguna.
```javascript
const { token } = await zencf.turnstileMax('https://example.com')
```

---

4Ô∏è‚É£ `zencf.source(url, proxy?)`

Mengambil HTML halaman setelah melewati Cloudflare.
```javascript
const res = await zencf.source('https://spa-website.com')
console.log(res.source)
```

---

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Penanganan Error
```javascript
try {
  const { token } = await zencf.turnstileMin(url, siteKey)
  console.log(token)
} catch (err) {
  console.error('zencf error:', err.message)
}
```

---

### üîí Catatan Keamanan

Token Turnstile harus diverifikasi di server-side

Hindari logging token sensitif di produksi

Gunakan proxy dari sumber tepercaya



---

### üß† Tips Penggunaan

`turnstileMin` ‚Üí cepat & ringan

`turnstileMax` ‚Üí proteksi ketat

`wafSession` ‚Üí tahap awal scraping

`source` ‚Üí situs SPA / HTML awal
